h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - The Second Sister
content: Another move can often happen when trying to flank her or attack on other sides, as she'll simply raise her body up high, and then slam down to the ground to deal massive damage on all sides.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Village_of_Lanxi_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Village of Lanxi Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - The Second Sister'.
The content is as follows:
Another move can often happen when trying to flank her or attack on other sides, as she'll simply raise her body up high, and then slam down to the ground to deal massive damage on all sides.
